ContentDesc_Arkadion - Schwergewicht R2: Following your triumph over Dancing Green, you now prepare to engage your next opponent, Sugar Riot. A rebellious artist who utilizes the soul of a pudding, she manifests her imaginings with an augmented palette, devastating her foes with beautiful brutality. One can only wonder, in the art of war, will the unstoppable upstart be able to keep up with this visionary?
Instancecontenttextdata_40714_Text: Oof! Will the challenger be alright!?
Instancecontenttextdata_40718_Text: Amazing! They clearly anticipated that attack!
Instancecontenttextdata_40721_Text: Oh no, that was too much for the challenger!
Instancecontenttextdata_40722_Text: The challenger's down! Is this the end!?
Instancecontenttextdata_40723_Text: The challenger rises again! Can they turn this around!?
Instancecontenttextdata_40724_Text: They're back on their feet! Let's see if they can stay standing!
Instancecontenttextdata_42200_Text: What inspiration will you give me, I wonder!
Instancecontenttextdata_42201_Text: Welcome to Sugar Riot's gallery of glamours!
Instancecontenttextdata_42203_Text: And with a flourish, Sugar Riot brings her work to life!
Instancecontenttextdata_42204_Text: When you can't decide on one thing...
Instancecontenttextdata_42205_Text: An image comes to me! I hope you like it hot and sandy!
Instancecontenttextdata_42206_Text: Goodness, the ring has become a desert!
Instancecontenttextdata_42207_Text: How about a little more sunshine?
Instancecontenttextdata_42208_Text: When I think desert, I think of these prickly fellows!
Instancecontenttextdata_42209_Text: Watch out, it's a veritable storm of needles!
Instancecontenttextdata_42210_Text: There's something missing... Oh, I know!
Instancecontenttextdata_42211_Text: Quicksand!? You don't want to get caught in that!
Instancecontenttextdata_42213_Text: What do you say to a refreshing riverscape?
Instancecontenttextdata_42215_Text: This is no good! It needs a touch of thunder, a dash of downpour!
Instancecontenttextdata_42216_Text: A thunderstorm has turned the waters muddy! How frightening!
Instancecontenttextdata_42217_Text: I have it! Some destruction to facilitate deconstruction!
Instancecontenttextdata_42218_Text: A massive, raging storm! I hope you brought your parasols!
Instancecontenttextdata_42224_Text: What do you think of this?
